summary: "Hallelujah" is a song by Leonard Cohen, first released in 1984. It became popular after John Cale and Jeff Buckley covered it. The song gained widespread fame when it was featured in the movie *Shrek* in 2001. Many artists have performed it, with over 300 versions known. Following Cohen's death in 2016, the song charted internationally and even reached the Billboard Hot 100 for the first time.
title: Hallelujah (Leonard Cohen song)
